summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Anti Cellulite Treatment - Top Cellulite Remover Cream - Best Tightening Lotion - Reduction & Firming - Today Get 100% Money Back Warranty - Remove, Lose & Get Rid of Cellulite - Extra Ebook Included Review Date: 2015/09/21 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.4 x 0.9 inches; 0.35 Ounces'} Review Text: This cellulite cream is not one of those hot, burning, ripoff products that make you feel like your cellulite is melting away when in reality you're only giving yourself a rash. This is a smooth, creamy, nice-smelling product that seems to really and truly be helping my cellulite. I am 5'2" and I weigh a firm, fit, muscular 125 pounds. I am also 43 years old and a mother of 3. Being as small as I am, I expected a few stretch marks with my pregnancies. I actually got lucky and ended up with very few stretch marks, but I did earn a little cellulite in my belly. Particularly around an old scar from where I had my appendix out at age 15. For whatever reason, this scar has become decidedly attached to some very stubborn fat cells. No matter what exercises I do, or how much cardio I do, this little scar retains a firm hold on an ugly little bubble of cellulite, and it's one of the few places I got a handful of stretch marks.
I have tried tons of products over the years, and never had much success. Now, I'm not saying this product is a miracle, because it isn't. My cellulite and stretch marks didn't disappear over night, or even in a week. But I have noticed some improvement, and I'm certain it isn't wishful thinking. I never hold much hope for any of these products, so that I'm never too disappointed. Also, I've stared in the mirror at this ugly little place on my body for years now. There has definitely been improvement.
This cream also makes my skin soft, and that's always a plus. At $22.00 for 4oz, I certainly wouldn't buy it as an all over lotion, but for spot treating stretch marks and cellulite....definitely.
I received this item at a discount for an honest review. I would have posted pictures, but I'm too self-conscious to do so...even without my face in the pic. But this is an honest review and I have in no way been compensated. Review Title: This is the real deal.... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: UNGLINGA Black Mask Blackhead Remover Purifying Peel Off Mask Bamboo Activated Charcoal Face Deep Pore Cleansing Mask For Face Nose and Acne Blemishes Treatment Review Date: 2015/09/21 Store: UNGLINGA Product Description: ['CONCERNS: Enlarged pore, Blackheads, Anti-aging, Fine lines and blemishes, Oily skin, Strawberry nose. Effect: Absorbent pores of blackheads and stubborn dirt, shrink pores, regulate oil secretion. How to use： Step 1 : Wash your face with warm water and cover it with a hot towel to open the pores . Step 2 : Spread the Blackhead remover mask gently on your face and wait 10-15 for it to dry. Step 3 : Peel off the black mask gently from chin to forehead . Step 4 : Rains with cold water and you may apply your daily skin care products afterwards. Tips: 1.The Blackhead Mask is only used for removing blackheads, exfoliating and cleaning the skin. 2.No effective against acne. Don’t use it on your acne or inflamed areas. 3.Spread the Blackhead Mask slowly in the same direction on your face and don’t stay on the same area too long. 4. Please ensure that you are not allergic. 5. If there is any discomfort, stop using. Package Included: 1 * Blackhead remover mask Gender: Unisex Net weight: 60g Shelf life: 3 years Ingredients: WATER, PROPANEDIOL, KAOLIN, POLYVINYLALCOHOL CROSSPOLYMER, POLYVINYL ALCOHOL, RUBBER LATEX, AMMONIUM GLYCOLATE, IMIDAZOLIDINYL UREA, AROMA'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 3 x 2.9 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038120383 777269135650 646437061445 646437182287', 'Manufacturer': 'KoEily'} Review Text: This is a mask that does exactly what it says. This mask goes on amazingly smooth, with very little scent. My daughter and I used it together. I have combination skin, and my teenaged daughter has normal skin with oily t-zone.
We placed warm towels on our clean faces before applying the mask, per the recommended instructions. When we washed off the mask it came off nicely without making our faces tender or irritated. There was no scrubbing, no rubbing and no soaking the dried mask to with a warm wet cloth to soften it first. We both felt like our faces were very refreshed and clean. We didn't feel overly dried out, but we also didn't feel like anything was left behind. We have very different skin, but we both loved the mask and the results!
I recently used another mask that was similar to this, but this one is cheaper and you get more. http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00QMP79QK?ref_=cm_cr-mr-title Beauty by Earth is a nice mask, but more expensive and you get the same results.
I received this item in exchange for an honest review. Review Title: This is going to be my go to mask for a long time! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Best Molding Creme for Strong Hold Matte Finish - No Shine Hair Product For Textured Modern Hairstyles - Lamel Styling Clay for All Hair Types 2.7 Ounce - Unixsex Review Date: 2015/09/27 Store: Lamel Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material Type Free': 'Dairy Free', 'Liquid Volume': '2.7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Brand': 'Lamel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.4 x 2.4 x 1.11 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '802991662027'} Review Text: Lamel pomade for men is a hit in this house. My stepsons love it, and prefer it to other products that have a strong smell. This pomade has very little scent, is sticky enough to hold hair in place for hours and yet flexible enough to be combed or worked with fingers multiple times throughout the day.
I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review. Review Title: Excellent men's pomade Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum with Vitamin C for Face - Organic Anti Aging & Anti-Wrinkle Skin Treatment - Penetrates Deeply & Activates Collagen Production for a Younger, Firmer & Brighter Complexion Review Date: 2015/10/14 Store: Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 1.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '787421301854'} Review Text: It's not often I find a firming serum that works this well. Not only does it moisturize perfectly, it plumps the skin and leaves it looking fresh and dewy! My makeup goes on like a dream, and at night when I lay down I know I'll wake up with my skin looking better by the next day. This gel is the perfect balance of moisture and and anti aging ingredients. Highly recommend! It works as well as other products that cost three times as much! Derma-Nu has several products in their line and I love them all. You get a coupon with your order for a discount on your next purchase, and they also include a detailed info and instruction leaflet.
I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review. My words and opinions are my own and were in no way influenced by the seller. Review Title: Derma-Nu Firming Serum with Hyaluronic Acid - A+ Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Best Anti Aging Face Cream With Both Retinol and Hyaluronic Acid! LARGE Size Facial Moisturizer For Youthful Radiant Skin | Enriched with Green Tea, Vitamin E & B5 Review Date: 2015/10/19 Store: Ové Beauty Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ové Beauty', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 6 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709797501'} Review Text: This Anti-aging beauty cream with hyaluronic acid and retinol is an impressive skin care product! This cream easily compares to the high dollar products that you buy at the beauty counter in expensive retail stores.
I have been using this for almost a week now, and every day I see an improvement. I put this on morning and night and follow with a moisturizer about 3 minutes later. My makeup goes on like a dream! I would highly recommend this serum to anyone who places high priority on their skin care regimen. I use many, many,many skin care items and am constantly looking for better and better products. My vanity cabinet is FULL of serums and creams, and lotions and oils. This item will be added to my regular regimen!
I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review. My words and opinions are my own and were in no way influenced by the seller. Review Title: Love this cream! Light, lovely scent and feels amazing! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Acne Treatment Supplement Now with Biotin- ClearFX Clinically Proven Acne Pills Formula to Remove Pimples, Blotchiness, Blackheads and Zits in 4 Weeks Review Date: 2015/11/05 Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '784672920230'} Review Text: Excellent quality supplements! Very easy to swallow, and the bottle I got was very fresh. We haven't had any aftertaste either. Good value for the money! I like that I take less of this than other skin clearing supplements I have tried. It seems to be helping with clearing minor blemishes.
I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review. My words and opinions are my own and were in no way influenced by the seller. Review Title: Works well, and you take less Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Anti Cellulite Treatment - Top Cellulite Remover Cream - Best Tightening Lotion - Reduction & Firming - Today Get 100% Money Back Warranty - Remove, Lose & Get Rid of Cellulite - Extra Ebook Included Review Date: 2015/09/21 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.4 x 0.9 inches; 0.35 Ounces'} Review Text: This cellulite cream is not one of those hot, burning, ripoff products that make you feel like your cellulite is melting away when in reality you're only giving yourself a rash. I actually got lucky and ended up with very few stretch marks, but I did earn a little cellulite in my belly. Particularly around an old scar from where I had my appendix out at age 15. For whatever reason, this scar has become decidedly attached to some very stubborn fat cells. No matter what exercises I do, or how much cardio I do, this little scar retains a firm hold on an ugly little bubble of cellulite, and it's one of the few places I got a handful of stretch marks.
I have tried tons of products over the years, and never had much success. Now, I'm not saying this product is a miracle, because it isn't. My cellulite and stretch marks didn't disappear over night, or even in a week. But I have noticed some improvement, and I'm certain it isn't wishful thinking. I never hold much hope for any of these products, so that I'm never too disappointed. Also, I've stared in the mirror at this ugly little place on my body for years now. This cream also makes my skin soft, and that's always a plus. At $22.00 for 4oz, I certainly wouldn't buy it as an all over lotion, but for spot treating stretch marks and cellulite....definitely.

Review Title: Works well, and you take less Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchasing history reveals a strong focus on skincare and personal grooming, emphasizing efficacy, quality, and value in their choices. They exhibit a pattern of being moderately price-sensitive, preferring products that offer a balance between cost and results. Notably, they express appreciation for products that yield visible improvements over time, illustrating a realistic approach to personal care—avoiding overly optimistic claims.

Common themes emerge around skin treatments aimed at addressing specific concerns such as cellulite, blackheads, acne, and anti-aging. This suggests an interest in targeted solutions rather than general skincare items, indicating a preference for products with multifunctional benefits, like moisturizing alongside anti-aging properties.

Quality is a recurring criterion, highlighted by favorable ratings for products that were effective yet affordably priced compared to high-end alternatives. The user demonstrates a preference for minimal scent in grooming products and values user-friendly application experiences.

In conclusion, their core preferences center around efficacy, quality, and sensible pricing in skincare and grooming, with a pragmatic and results-oriented approach to personal care. They favor products that integrate seamlessly into their routine while providing tangible benefits.

target_interaction.title: Better than expected and works as well as high priced similar products!
target_interaction.text:
Better results than expected! I would highly recommend this product to anyone who wants to lengthen and thicken their lashes and brows! In two weeks time I have had very good results!
I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review. My words and opinions are my own and were in no way influenced by the seller.
